tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE labeled_audio_data (audio_id INT PRIMARY KEY, audio_blob BYTEA, label VARCHAR(100));
CREATE TABLE speech_recognition_models (model_id INT PRIMARY KEY, model_name VARCHAR(100), accuracy FLOAT);

CREATE TABLE users (
    user_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    username VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    email VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    age INT,
    created_at TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE recordings (
    recording_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id UUID REFERENCES users(user_id),
    audio_file BYTEA NOT NULL,
    label VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    duration INT NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE model_predictions (
    prediction_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    model_id UUID REFERENCES models(model_id),
    audio_id UUID REFERENCES recordings(recording_id),
    predicted_label VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    confidence FLOAT NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE labeled_audio_files (
  file_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  file_name VARCHAR(255),
  label VARCHAR(50),
  audio_data BYTEA
)

CREATE TABLE users (
  user_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  username VARCHAR(50),
  email VARCHAR(255),
  password_hash VARCHAR(255)
)

CREATE TABLE user_roles (
  user_role_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  user_id UUID,
  role VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE models (
  model_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  model_name VARCHAR(100),
  model_type VARCHAR(50),
  model_accuracy FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE model_results (
  result_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  model_id UUID,
  audio_file_id UUID,
  result TEXT
)
